parentQuestions.title: 7. How many participants will be needed for the assessment?
8. Will it be an in-person or a remote participation?
9. What form of compensation, if any, will the participants receive?
parentQuestions.instruction:
A. If the participants will be compensated, describe the form of compensation they will receive.

e.g. money, grade, credit, gift, etc.

B. If otherwise, specify it will be a volunteer participation.

parentQuestions.title: 10. What are the eligibility criteria for the participants?
parentQuestions.instruction: Describe the characteristics that must be shared by all participants involved in the assessment.

parentQuestions.title: 11. Will a demographic questionnaire be used to collect information from the participants?
parentQuestions.instruction: If the answer is 'YES', describe how the data obtained will be used.

parentQuestions.title: 12. How will the participants be instructed?
13. Which questions will be asked to the participants?
parentQuestions.instruction: Note that your questions should be aligned to the described goals above in order to maintain coherence
